trans-unit.source: Represents child controls of containers that support the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 表示子控制項之容器的支援<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern"></xref>控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[UI 自動化用戶端的控制項模式對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需範例，可以實作此控制項模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式識別項會傳遞至方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>擷取控制項模式，從指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感興趣的</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref> within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示捲動內容區域的容器物件<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>可見區域 (viewport) 的容器內。

trans-unit.source: This method does not provide the ability to specify the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不提供讓您指定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>可見區域 (viewport) 的容器內。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: The item could not be scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 項目不可以捲動到檢視。
